content.description: Sit start laying back in the crack, pull on and work up the crack and left under the small roof, move left along the crack until you can reach up to the arete. Match up on that arete, bring your feet up under the roof and then rock up and around the corner to the left.
content.location: Right along the Hillside Boulder, near to the Supermoon boulder. Approach the boulder by going to Supercrack 2 Area, turn left and hike up the hill along the long boulder giving this zone it's name.

content.description: Sit start laying back in the crack, pull on and work up to the crack and then make one long reach straight up to the lip of the boulder. Match up, bring your feet up and rock right over the top of the face.
content.location: Right along the Hillside Boulder, near to the Supermoon boulder. Approach the boulder by going to Supercrack 2 Area, turn left and hike up the hill along the long boulder giving this zone it's name.

content.description: The boulder problems listed here are those that are actually on the large, long boulder that runs all the way up the hillside.
